steps.question: Should we define the goal before execution?

options.label: Define goal together
options.description: Start co-construction of a GoalContract.

options.label: Proceed as-is
options.description: Skip Telos and continue with current goal framing.

steps.question: Which dimension family should we define first?

options.label: Outcome first
options.description: Define the concrete end state before other dimensions.

options.label: Boundary or priority
options.description: Define scope or trade-off policy first.

options.label: Metric first
options.description: Define how success will be measured first.

steps.question: Select the next specific dimension to define.

options.label: Boundary
options.description: Specify inclusions, exclusions, and limits.

options.label: Priority
options.description: Specify trade-off order when values conflict.

options.label: Metric
options.description: Specify measurable success criteria.

steps.question: Do you want to define another dimension now?

options.label: Define another dimension
options.description: Continue the dimension selection loop.

options.label: Move to proposal
options.description: Use current dimensions and generate a proposal.

options.label: Stop Telos
options.description: Terminate goal co-construction.

steps.question: How do you want to handle this proposal?

options.label: Accept
options.description: Adopt the proposal as the current contract value.

options.label: Modify
options.description: Adjust one aspect while keeping proposal structure.

options.label: Reject
options.description: Discard and request an alternative proposal.

steps.question: Which aspect should be modified first?

options.label: Target level
options.description: Change strictness, scope, or expected impact size.

options.label: Time horizon
options.description: Change delivery timing or milestone boundaries.

options.label: Constraint baseline
options.description: Change required constraints or mandatory safeguards.

options.label: Approve and proceed
options.description: Finalize goal definition and continue execution.

options.label: Revise contract
options.description: Return to unresolved dimensions or proposal updates.

options.label: Stop goal mode
options.description: Exit Telos without further refinement.
